game.subRules: Rules: Follow the conditions and drink

cards.text: Everybody drinks
The person who got this card must drink
The person who dropped this card and must come up with a word, then the players in a circle have to come up with a rhyme. Who could not drink
The person who dropped this card chooses who drinks with him all the time
The person who dropped this card chooses who should drink now
Only guys drink
The person who dropped this card chooses who will drink with him now
The person who dropped this card will come up with a movement. All players, when they have a drink, have to repeat the movement. Forgot to drink again
The person who dropped this card will come up with a category. Everyone in a circle has a complement to this category. For example (Category: Professions Words: Bartender ...)
The person who got this card chooses with whom to take a selfie and is forced to post a photo on the social network
The person who dropped this card at any moment of the game puts his finger on the table. The last ones who put their finger down are drinking. Can be used many times but only until the next jack
All the girls are drinking
The person who dropped this card is forced to drink a shot
